name: The End Passport
description:
The end passport is a game created for the Battle Cat Game Jam #1

Theme "Death is a luxury few can afford"

Soo here is the game:

You are trapped in this "paradise" city where dead doesnt exist, every time you die reapear seconds before you die like nothing happens, but this city counts with an unique way to get out, with the END PASSPORT.

Only those with the enought money can buy it to get out and do what some one really want, END this eternal life.

Only someones can buy a pass to the real death.

Mechanics are simple, move left or right with A/D or the ARROWS and use SPACE to jump.

You can resist some fall distance, get hurt if it a little high or die if it to high.

If you are hurt can continue playing untill you recover but be carefull another hurt fall can kill you if you are in hurt status.

Get in mind that every dead is not free if you have money, that money you lost is reubicated in the map.

Get enought coins to buy the PASSPORT (the PASSPORT Store is hidden in the deep of the left of the map) and get out of the city.

Hope you enjoy it and like it x3

Spoiler of music, posibles new songs

JFBr - The End Passport

JFBr - No Way Out
